messages.title: Did you know that your current Labour MP:
messages.content:
Voted to INCREASE the tax paid by the lowest paid workers by removing the 10p tax rate.
Voted to CLOSE local Post Offices.
Voted to spend Â£100 billion of YOUR money to put new nuclear weapons on the River Clyde.
Voted FOR the illegal war in Iraq, but Labour failed to properly equip our soldiers.
Voted AGAINST reform of Parliament despite sleaze scandals.
Had a row with the House of Commons over his EXPENSES.
Branded 1 of the 6 worst MPs for 'failing our democracy' by an independent campaign group.

issues.governance: Voted AGAINST reform of Parliament despite sleaze scandals.

leaflet.personalStatement: I was a member of the Labour party for years, until I came to realise that voting Labour wasn't in Scotland's interests anymore. It wasn't so much that I left Labour. I felt that they left me. Any doubt I had about that was cast aside forever when I watched Gordon Brown cosying up to Margaret Thatcher in Downing Street.

endorsements.endorsement: Labour have let you down says...
